name: suisei-bot
description: Discord bot: Music + Gemini Chat + Voice Assistant (STT) + TTS

scripts.postinstall: node -e "(async()=>{try{const y=require('yt-dlp-exec'); if(y.exec){await y.exec('--version')} else {await y('--version')} console.log('yt-dlp ready')}catch(e){console.log('yt-dlp warmup skipped:', e?.message||e)}})()"
